transcript.text: this is luke with the outdoor boys
youtube channel and this is my son
tommy and nathan and i'm here in the
heart of alaska with my friend jake from
the how to alaska youtube channel and
his sons
cody and luke and we're about to go on
an incredible
snow machining winter camping adventure
where almost
everything goes wrong i think you guys
are going to enjoy this adventure
you ready nate we're gonna have a good
old time
all right we've had some trouble with
the trailer popping off the hitch
so we've used some alaskan ingenuity
here
we got pretty pink zip ties and a piece
of willow
i think that'll actually work

we're trying to cross this big river
here but you don't necessarily want to
be the first one across so we're looking
for some snow machine tracks where
someone safely crossed
jake's all the way down the river here
and he's trying to look for a place to
safely cross
you can see here we go this is where
overflow happens where water pops up and
flows over the top of the ice
and then it's frozen again but there's a
lot of weird spots on the ice because
the river will freeze and then the water
levels will drop and there'll be these
big air pockets
in between the ice and the gravel bar
the water and you can bust through into
these little
airpods it's crazy so we're gonna we're
gonna see if we can find a good spot
all right well it looks like we can't
find any really good places to cross the

and uh we're gonna try another spot here
